rules.title: Accessory Structure Daylight Plane

figures.caption: Front elevation showing accessory-structure daylight plane at the side of the lot
labels: Side lot line (left side of building)
Side lot line (right side of building)
figures.description: Graphic shows a garage front elevation under a dashed daylight plane extending from both side lot lines.

figures.caption: Side elevation showing accessory-structure daylight plane at the rear of the lot
figures.description: Graphic shows a side elevation of a garage with the daylight plane sloping inward from the rear lot line.

rules.note: For accessory buildings near the rear & side lot lines, a hipped-gable roof is often the best solution for complying with the accessory-structure daylight plane.

qualifiers.applicability: Structures near side and rear lot lines

mandatory: Daylight plane must be adhered to for accessory structures near lot lines

alternatives: Hipped-gable roof as a solution for compliance
